CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL ( PS__c ) , null , TEXT( CurrencyIsoCode ) + " " + TEXT ( PS__c ) + " MM" + "/" ) & IF( ISNULL ( RF__c ) , " " , RF__c + "/") & IF( ISNULL ( FA__c ) , " " , TEXT( CurrencyIsoCode ) + " " + TEXT ( FA__c ) + " MM" ) & IF( ISNULL ( PE__c ) , null , TEXT( CurrencyIsoCode ) + " " + TEXT ( PE__c ) + " MM" )
CustomField.label: Securities (Reporting)
